review:
Dr. Tejal shah was very soft with her hands. The treatment went very smooth. She gave all instructions related to treatment well in advance and explained everything throughout. Gave good recommendations post treatment to be followed. 
Would definitely visit again for any dental problems and recommend others as well. 
The clinic follows all protocols related to safety and Hygiene. I really had a very good experience. They are fairly priced compared to others. 

Thank you and will surely visit again !!
reply_text: Thanks alot . Appreciate it..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor explained the issue related to my tooth problem and told me exactly what was needed to be done.  She did the dental filling with lot of care and thoroughly.
Also advised me about dental care. 
A very friendly and polite doctor.
I definitely recommend her for all dental issues.
reply_text: Thanks alot for the feedback.. Appreciate it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Tejal is a very caring doctor. She has customer cares skills. She is approachable. She goes through the whole process and explains in details.  I like her a lot and as I don’t have enough time for my treatment she accommodates and fits me in between appointments. Thanks a lot Tejal. 

All my friends are very happy with her treatment.
reply_text: Thanks alot for your valuable feedback. Appreciate it alot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Tejal Shah is an extremely dedicated, ************ and friendly doctor. Her knowledge of dentistry, makes is visible from the fact that she doesn’t overtreat just to prescribe medicines or procedures. She will do what is most suited and educate the patients on prevention. Being a doctor myself, I totally vouch for her skills, my go to person for all my dental issues.
reply_text: Thanks alot for the feedback. Appreciate it alot..

review:
My mother is 75year old and had a dental issue. Got 
a good review about Dr. Tejal from my neighbour.  So took my mom for dental treatment to her.  Best part I liked was Dr. Tejal the way she explained the problem and gave solution of artificial teeth, my mom got so relaxed. Also the treatment went smoothly and was very satisfactory taking into consideration all the precautions and safety measures. Thank you Dr. Tejal.
reply_text: Thanks alot. Appreciate your feedback.
